issue.title: [R] Fix reference to json_table_reader() in R docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11467](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11467). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The docs entry for the R function `read_json_arrow()` refers to the nonexistent function `json_table_reader()`. This should be changed to `JsonTableReader$create()`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11467?focusedCommentId=17277599) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9393
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9393>
